alert.note: Alert for Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 2:02PM CDT until March 18 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...A changeover to wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, although locally higher amounts are possible across northwest Rice county. Strong north winds will gust up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Rice County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS... While most of the snow accumulation will be on grassy surfaces, roads and highways could become partially snow packed, slushy and slick. The hazardous conditions will impact the early morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
